title: Rogue
features: If you successfully Sneak up on a foe (usually Subterfuge + DEX, but depends on the situation), you can add your Subterfuge bonus to the damage of your first attack.

title: Cleric
features: You can Turn Undead with a successful Magic Attack. DC is the current HP of the Undead. If the DC is exceeded by 10 it is destroyed. This can be used REPLACE_ONE times per day.

title: Paladin
features: You apply a + REPLACE_ONE bonus to all Saving Throws.
You can Detect Evil with 60 ft. at will and can Heal up to REPLACE_TWO HP per day by Laying on Hands.

title: Ranger
features: You uncur only a - 1 Attack penalty when fighting with two weapons.

title: Druid
features: You are immune to the spell-like effect of woodland fey.
At 3<sup>RD</sup> Level you can Pass Without Trace at will.
At 7<sup>TH</sup> Level you can assume the form of any small or medium-sized animal up to 3 times per day, and you heal 2 HP when changing back into your normal form.

title: Bard
features: You can counter sound effects within a 30 ft. radius.
You can perform to Charm Person or Remove Fear up to 3 times (total) per day.
Beginning at 6TH Level, you can cast spells as either a Druid or Illusionist, at your choice, of 5 levels lower.
